|BowlTourneyResult=Win, 31-28, vs. [[1992 Utah Utes football team|Utah]] }} The '''1992 Washington State Cougars football team''' represented [[Washington State University]] during the 1992 NCAA college football season. ==Regular season== The Cougars non-conference games were against Montana, Fresno State and Temple. {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center"
